name: Casella Waste Systems, Inc.
description: Casella Waste Systems, Inc. is a leading provider of comprehensive waste management services in the northeastern United States. Founded in 1975 by John Casella, the company specializes in sustainable waste management solutions, recycling, and resource recovery. With a commitment to environmental stewardship, Casella aims to transform waste into resources, helping communities reduce their environmental footprint. The company operates a network of solid waste collection, recycling, and disposal services, including transfer stations, landfills, and recycling facilities. Casella's innovative approach to waste management focuses on maximizing recycling rates and minimizing landfill use, contributing to a circular economy. The company also provides tailored waste solutions to commercial, municipal, and residential customers, emphasizing customer service and sustainability. Casella Waste Systems is dedicated to enhancing the quality of life in the communities it serves while promoting sustainable practices that benefit both the environment and local economies.
